BOOK TEE TIMES
Follow us on Facebook

Corporate & Private Events
The Perfect Venue for Your Corporate Retreat or Private Event
Welcome to Mystic Dunes Golf Club, a premier destination for your corporate meetings, team-building activities and private events in Orlando, Florida. Nestled amid the serene natural beauty of Central Florida, our newly updated golf course and exceptionally renovated facilities provide the perfect backdrop for your next unforgettable gathering.
Exceptional Facilities for Memorable Events
At Mystic Dunes, we understand the importance of creating a lasting impression for your guests. Our versatile 3,000 square foot event space can accommodate groups from 15 to 150 and can be set up in many configurations with either round or classroom-style tables. Equipped with state-of-the-art audiovisual technology and impeccable catering services, our on-site, day-of event planner ensures that your event runs seamlessly from start to finish.
Unparalleled Golf Experience
Get out of the board room and enhance your event with some outdoor experiences on Mystic Dunes’ 18-hole championship course, designed by the renowned golf architect Gary Panks, or events on our practice facilities. Whether you’re hosting a corporate golf tournament or a team-building activity, your guests will be captivated by the course’s breathtaking vistas and meticulously maintained fairways.
Exceptional Hospitality & Personalized Service
At Mystic Dunes, we pride ourselves on our exceptional hospitality and personalized service. Our dedicated event planning team will work closely with you to understand your unique needs and preferences, ensuring that every detail of your event is tailored to your specifications. From customized catering menus to bespoke event decor, we will go above and beyond to make your event a resounding success.
Convenient Location and Accommodations
Conveniently located in the heart of Central Florida, Mystic Dunes Golf Club is easily accessible from major transportation hubs and offers a variety of on-site resort accommodation options to suit your guests’ needs. Whether you’re planning a day-long meeting or a multi-day retreat, our central location and ample lodging choices make it easy for your attendees to immerse themselves in the event experience.
Elevate Your Next Event at Mystic Dunes Golf Club
Experience the perfect blend of world-class facilities, exceptional hospitality and stunning natural surroundings at Mystic Dunes Golf Club. Contact us today to start planning your unforgettable corporate retreat or private event in sunny Florida.
